content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello, Yi-Nuo Wang. It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite suitable for your needs. Let's discuss the rental price. How much were you considering?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, I am a student, so I have a limited budget. I was thinking of 300 Euro per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but that's quite low for the location and amenities my apartment offers. I'm looking for a price closer to 500 Euro per month. Is that within your budget?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's too high for me, I'm afraid. I can increase my offer a little, but not that much. What about 350 Euro per month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 350 Euro is still not acceptable. I'm willing to negotiate, but I need at least 450 Euro per month to cover my expenses and investment. Is this still within your budget?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's still too high. I'm willing to increase my offer, but not that much. What about 400 Euro per month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 400 Euro per month is more reasonable, but it's still below my expectations. I'm looking for a price closer to 475 Euro per month. Is this within your budget?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's still too high. I'm willing to increase my offer, but not that much. What about 450 Euro per month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 450 Euro per month is closer to what I'm looking for, but it's still not quite there. I'm willing to accept 460 Euro per month as a final offer. Is this acceptable to you?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [460] Euro!
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of 460 Euro! TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
